Nana is not the best at writing her recipe's down but she did write this one up for me.

dry

-   1 cup flour
-   1.5 tablespoon white sugar
-   1/4 teaspoon salt

wet

-   4 large eggs
-   1.25 cup of milk
-   1+ teasppon of vanilla\
    (use pancake syrup if you can't find vanilla -- then cut back on sugar)
-   1 tablespoon of oil

notes

-   Sugar, for garnish

-   Fry in a well heated and generously oiled pant st
